revised_title: Demonstration of the Cause of Mercury Descent in Barometer During Storms
tldr: Francis Hauksbee conducts an experiment to demonstrate the cause of mercury descent in a barometer during storms. He uses a setup with two barometers connected to a system that releases compressed air, causing the mercury to descend. The experiment shows that high winds can lessen the pressure of the atmosphere, and the mercury in the barometers subsides.
